S04n438:1: iti hi bhikṣavo'bhisaṃbuddhastathāgato devairabhiṣṭūyamānaḥ paryaṅkamabhindannanimiṣanayano drumarājaṃ prekṣate sma |
S04n438:3: atha saptāhe'tikrānte kāmāvacarā devaputrā daśagandhodakakumbhasahasrāṇi parigṛhya yena tathāgatastenopasaṃkrāmanti sma |

S04n438:5: upasaṃkramya bodhivṛkṣaṃ tathāgataṃ ca gandhodakena snāpayanti sma |
S04n438:6: gaṇanāsamatikrāntāśca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragāstena tathāgatakāyapatitena gandhodakena svakasvakān kāyānupalimpanti sma |

S04n438:11: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ samantakusumo nāma devaputrastasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatito'bhūt |
S04n438:12: sa tathāgatasya caraṇayornipatya prāñjalistathāgatametadavocat-ko nāmāyaṃ bhagavan samādhiryena samādhinā samanvāgatastathāgataḥ saptarātraṃ viharatyabhinnaparyaṅkaḥ?
S04n438:13: evamukto bhikṣavastathāgatastaṃ devaputrametadavocat-prītyāhāravyūho nāma devaputra ayaṃ samādhiryena samādhinā samanvāgatastathāgataḥ saptarātraṃ vyāhārṣīdabhinnaparyaṅkaḥ ||
S04n438:14: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ samantakusumo devaputrastathāgataṃ gāthābhirabhyastāvīt—
S04n438:22: saptāhaṃ mahimaṇḍe jinā na bhindanti paryaṅkam ||4 ||
S04n438:23: kiṃ tu khalu paśyamānaḥ saptāhaṃ animeṣeṇa narasiṃhā |
S04n438:25: kiṃ tu bhavateṣa praṇidhī utāhu sarveṣa vādisiṃhānām |
S04n438:26: yena drumarājamūle paryaṅka na bhindi saptāham ||6 ||
S04n438:28: pravada vacanaṃ avitathaṃ kuruṣva prītiṃ naramarūṇām ||7 ||
S04n438:29: tamuvāca candravacanaḥ śṛṇuṣva me bhāṣato amaraputra |
S04n438:32: saptāhu taṃ pradeśaṃ na jahāti hi dharmatā rājñām ||9 ||
S04n438:33: evameva daśabalā api abhiṣiktā bhonti yada praṇidhipūrṇāḥ |
S04n438:34: saptāhu dharaṇimaṇḍe jinā na bhindanti paryaṅkam ||10 ||
S04n438:36: buddhā pi bodhimaṇḍe kleśāṃ nihatāṃ nirīkṣante ||11 ||
S04n438:38: sāhoḍhā iva caurā vināśitā ye niravaśeṣāḥ ||12 ||
S04n438:39: iha me hatāna vividhā mānavidhāmanyunā puraniketāḥ |
S04n438:41: iha sā akāryakartrī bhavatṛṣṇā cāriṇī tathāvidyā |
S04n438:43: iha sā ahaṃ mameti ca kalipāśu durānugāḍhalitamūlā |
S04n438:45: iha te ciraṃ samāyata ullāpanakā vināśaparyantāḥ |
S04n438:48: maya uddhṛtā aśeṣā bhūyaśca na jātu jñāsyante ||17 ||
S04n438:51: iha sā vitarkamālā saṃjñāsūtreṣu granthitā nipathī ||
S04n438:53: durgāni pañcaṣaṣṭi mohānī triṃśatiṃ ca malināni |
S04n438:66: iha te kleśāraṇyaṃ chinnaṃ vinayāgninā dagdham ||26 ||
S04n438:75: iha so mayā hyatibalo asmiṃ mārastrilokavaśavartī |
S04n438:97: iha mamiyitā ca sarve ādhyātmikabāhirā parikṣīṇā |
S04n438:99: iha lālayitā sarve martyā divyā bhavāgraparyantāḥ |

S04n438:127: iha me tatkhalu śuddhaṃ varanayanaṃ yena (loka)
S04n438:133: so'pi ca tathā avitathā iha maya pīto hyamṛtamaṇḍaḥ ||59 ||
S04n438:143: prāgjinasiṃhaiḥ pūrve iha me pīto hyamṛtamaṇḍaḥ ||64 ||
S04n438:144: yā bhāṣitā ca vāgme mārasyehāgatasya sasainyasya |
S04n438:148: prāptaṃ mayārahatvaṃ kṣīṇā me āśravā niravaśeṣāḥ |
S04n438:149: bhagnā ca namucisenā bhinadmi tasmāddhi paryaṅkam ||67 ||
S04n438:150: nīvaraṇakapāṭāni ca pañca mayeha pradāritā sarvā |
S04n438:157: atulāṃ karonti pūjāṃ apsaranayutaiḥ saha samagrāḥ ||71 ||
S04n438:158: evaṃ khalu devasutāḥ sahetu sapratyayaṃ ca sanidānam |
S04n438:159: saptāhu dharaṇimaṇḍe jinā na bhindanti paryaṅkam ||72 ||
S04n438:160: iti hi bhikṣavo'bhisaṃbuddhabodhistathāgataḥ prathame saptāhe tatraivāsane'sthāt-iha mayānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā,

S04n438:163: tṛtīye saptāhe tathāgato'nimiṣaṃ bodhimaṇḍamīkṣate sma-iha mayānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyānavarāgrasya jātijarāmaraṇaduḥkhasyāntaḥ kṛta iti |
S04n438:164: caturthe saptāhe tathāgato daharacaṃkramaṃ caṃkramyate sma pūrvasamudrātpaścimasamudramupagṛhya ||
S04n438:165: atha khalu māraḥ pāpīyān yena tathāgatastenopasaṃkrāmat |
S04n438:169: evamukte bhikṣavastathāgato māraṃ pāpīyāṃsametadavocat-na tāvadahaṃ pāpīyan parinirvāsyāmi yāvanme na sthavirā bhikṣavo bhaviṣyanti dāntā vyaktā vinītā viśāradā bahuśrutā dharmānudharmapratipannāḥ pratibalāḥ svayamācāryakaṃ jñānaṃ paridīpayitumutpannotpannānāṃ ca parapravādināṃ saha dharmeṇa nigṛhyābhiprāyaṃ prasādya saprātihāryaṃ dharmaṃ deśayitum |
S04n438:170: na tāvadahaṃ pāpīyan parinirvāsyāmi yāvanmayā buddhadharmasaṃghavaṃśo lokena pratiṣṭhāpito bhaviṣyati |
S04n438:171: aparimitā bodhisattvā na vyākṛtā bhaviṣyanti anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
S04n438:172: na tāvadahaṃ pāpīyān parinirvāsyāmi yāvanme na catasraḥ parṣado dāntā vinītā vyaktā viśāradā bhaviṣyanti yāvatsaprātihāya dharmaṃ deśayitumiti ||
S04n438:173: atha khalu māraḥ pāpīyānidaṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā ekānte prakrāmya sthito'bhūt duḥkhī durmanā vipratisārī adhomukhaḥ kāṣṭhena mahīṃ vilikhan viṣayaṃ me'tikrānta iti ||
S04n438:174: atha khalu tāstisro māraduhitaro ratiścāratiśca tṛṣṇā ca māraṃ pāpīyāṃsaṃ gāthayādhyabhāṣanta—
S04n438:175: durmanāsi kathaṃ tāta procyatāṃ yadyasau naraḥ |
S04n438:176: rāgapāśena taṃ buddhvā kuñjaraṃ vā nayāmahe ||73 ||
S04n438:177: ānayitvā ca taṃ śīghraṃ kariṣyāma vaśe tava | * * * * * ||74 ||
S04n438:180: arahan sugato loke na rāgasya vaśaṃ vrajet |

S04n438:183: tāśca tathāgato na manasi karoti sma |
S04n438:186: satyaṃ vadasi nastāta na rāgeṇa sa nīyate |
S04n438:192: nāhaṃ paśyāmi taṃ loke puruṣaṃ sacarācare |
S04n438:194: śīghraṃ gatvā nivedaya atyayaṃ svakṛtaṃ muneḥ |
S04n438:196: tatastā gatvā tathāgataṃ kṣamāpayanti sma-atyayaṃ no bhagavān pratigṛhṇātu |
S04n438:197: atyayaṃ no sugato pratigṛhṇātu yathā bālānāṃ yathā mūḍhānāṃ yathā vyaktānāmakuśalānāmakṣetrajñānāṃ yā vayaṃ bhagavantamāsādayitavyaṃ manyāmahe |
S04n438:202: tatkasmāt? vṛddhireṣā ārye dharmavinaye yo'tyayamatyayato dṛṣṭvā pratideśayatyāyatyāṃ ca saṃvaramāpadyate ||
S04n438:203: pañcame saptāhe bhikṣavastathāgato mucilindanāgarājabhavane viharati sma saptāhe mahādurdine |
S04n438:204: atha khalu mucilindanāgarājaḥ svabhavanānniṣkramya tathāgatasya kāye saptakṛdbhogena pariveṣṭya phaṇaiśchādayati sma-mā bhagavataḥ kāyaṃ śītavātāḥ prākṣuriti |
S04n438:205: pūrvasyā api diśo'nye'pi saṃbahulā nāgarājā āgatya tathāgatasya kāyaṃ saptakṛdbhogaiḥ pariveṣṭya phaṇaiśchādayanti sma-mā bhagavataḥ kāyaṃ śītavātāḥ prākṣuriti |
S04n438:206: yathā pūrvasyāṃ diśi evaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimottarābhyo digbhyo nāgarājā āgatya tathāgatasya kāyaṃ saptakṛtvo bhogaiḥ pariveṣṭya phaṇaiśrchādayanti-sma mā bhagavataḥ kāyaṃ śītavātāḥ prākṣuriti |
S04n438:208: na ca tairnāgarājaistādṛśaṃ kadācitsukhaṃ prāptaṃ pūrvaṃ yādṛśaṃ teṣāṃ tāni saptarātriṃdivasāni tathāgatakāyasaṃnikarṣādāsīt |
S04n438:209: tataḥ saptāhasyātyayena tataste nāgarājā vyapagatadurdinaṃ viditvā tathāgatasya kāyādbhogānapanīya tathāgatasya pādau śirasābhivandya tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya svakasvakāni bhavanānyupajagmuḥ |

S04n438:212: antare ca mucilindabhavanasyāntarāccājapālasya nadyā nairañjanāyāstīre carakaparivrājakavṛddhaśrāvakagautamanirgranthājīvikādayastathāgataṃ dṛṣṭvābhibhāṣante sma-api bhagavatā gautamenedaṃ saptāhamakāladurdinaṃ samyaksukhena vyatināmitam?

S04n438:238: tāvapi na vahete sma sotpalahastena ca sumanādāmakena ca vāhyamānau |
S04n438:239: teṣāmetadabhavat-asaṃśayaṃ purataḥ kiṃcidbhayaṃ yenaitāvapi na vahataḥ |
S04n438:243: tayāpi devatayā svarūpaṃ saṃdarśya āśvāsitāḥ-mā bhetavyamiti |
S04n438:244: tāvapi balīvadau yena tathāgatastena śakaṭā prakarṣitau yāvatte paśyanti sma tathāgataṃ vaiśvānaramiva pradīptaṃ dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtamaciroditamiva dinakaraṃ śriyā daidīpyamānam |

S04n438:261: tataścatvāri sarvaratnamayāni pātrāṇi gṛhītvā tathāgatasyopanāmayanti sma |

S04n438:263: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgatasya punaretadabhūt-evaṃ katamadvidhaiḥ pātraiḥ pūrvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ pratigṛhītam?

S04n438:267: tato vairocano nāma nīlakāyiko devaputraḥ so'smānevamāha—

S04n438:281: upasaṃkramya tathāgatasya pūjāṃ kṛtvā tāni pātrāṇi divyakusumapratipūrṇāni tathāgatāyopanāmayanti sma ||
S04n438:282: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgatasyaitadabhavat-amī khalu punaścatvāro mahārājāḥ śraddhāḥ prasannāḥ mama catvāri śailapātrāṇyupanāmayanti |
S04n438:283: na ca me catvāri śailapātrāṇi kalpante |
S04n438:287: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgato dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ prasārya vaiśravaṇaṃ mahārājaṃ gāthayādhyabhāṣata—
S04n438:292: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgato vaiśravaṇasya mahārājasyāntikāttatpātraṃ pratigṛhṇīte sma anukampāmupādāya |
S04n438:295: na tasya jātu smṛti prajña hīyate |
S04n438:298: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgato dhṛtarāṣṭrasya mahārājasyāntikāttatpātraṃ pratigṛhṇīte sma anukampāmupādāya |
S04n438:304: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgato virūḍhakasya mahārājasyāntikāttatpātraṃ pratigṛhṇīte sma anukampāmupādāya |

S04n438:332: tāṃ tādṛśīṃ prekṣya ca te avasthāṃ
S04n438:335: vane mṛgaṃ vā mṛgayan ka eṣaḥ |
S04n438:346: śabdaṃ ca te taṃ madhuraṃ niśāmya
S04n438:350: tena khalu bhikṣavaḥ samayena trapuṣabhallikānāṃ vaṇijāṃ pratyantakarvaṭe goyūthaṃ prativasati sma |
S04n438:351: atha tā gāvastasmin kāle tasmin samaye sarpimaṇḍaṃ pradugdhā abhūvan |
S04n438:352: atha gopālāstatsarpimaṇḍamādāya yena trapuṣabhallikau vaṇijau tenopasaṃkrāman |
S04n438:353: upasaṃkramyemāṃ prakṛtimārocayanti sma-yatkhalu yūyaṃ bhaṭṭā jānīyāta-sarvāstā gāvaḥ sarpimaṇḍaṃ pradugdhāḥ |
S04n438:357: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena trapuṣabhallikānāṃ vaṇijāṃ śikhaṇḍī nāma brāhmaṇaḥ pūrvajātisālohito brahmaloke pratyājāto'bhūt |
S04n438:365: evaṃ saṃcodya vaṇijaḥ śikhaṇḍī bhavanaṃ gataḥ |

S04n438:389: arthā vaḥ śāsatāṃ sarve bhavatvāśu pradakṣiṇā ||109 ||
S04n438:390: śrīrvo'stu dakṣiṇe haste śrīrvo vāme pratiṣṭhitā |
S04n438:392: dhanaiṣiṇāṃ prayātānāṃ vaṇijāṃ vai diśo daśa |
S04n438:395: nakṣatrāṇi vaḥ pālentu ye tasyāṃ diśi saṃsthitā ||112 ||
S04n438:402: putrā pi tasya bahava ekanāmā vicakṣaṇāḥ |
S04n438:404: te'pi va adhipālentu ārogyena śivena ca ||116 ||
S04n438:405: pūrvasmin vai diśo bhāge aṣṭau devakumārikāḥ |
S04n438:408: tā pi va adhipālentu ārogyena śivena ca ||118 ||
S04n438:409: pūrvasmin vai diśo bhāge cāpālaṃ nāma cetiyam |
S04n438:411: te'pi va adhipālentu ārogyena śivena ca ||119 ||
S04n438:412: kṣemāśca vo diśaḥ santu mā ca vaḥ pāpamāgamat |
S04n438:415: nakṣatrāṇi vaḥ pālentu ye tāṃ diśamadhiṣṭhitā ||121 ||
S04n438:416: maghā ca dvau ca phālgunyau hastā citrā ca pañcamī |
S04n438:417: svātiścaiva viśākhā ca eteṣāṃ dakṣiṇā diśā ||122 ||
S04n438:419: ādiṣṭā dakṣiṇe bhāge te vo rakṣantu sarvataḥ ||123 ||
S04n438:420: teṣāṃ cādhipatī rājā virūḍhaka iti smṛtaḥ |
S04n438:422: putrā pi tasya bahava ekanāmā vicakṣaṇāḥ |
S04n438:424: te'pi va adhipālentu ārogyena śivena ca ||125 ||
S04n438:428: tā pi va adhipālentu ārogyena śivena ca ||127 ||
S04n438:431: te'pi va adhipālentu ārogyena śivena ca ||128 ||
S04n438:432: kṣemāśca vo diśaḥ santu mā ca vaḥ pāpamāgamat |
S04n438:435: nakṣatrāṇi vaḥ pālentu ye tāṃ diśamadhiṣṭhitā ||130 ||
S04n438:436: anurādhā ca jeṣṭhā ca mūlā ca dṛḍhavīryatā |
S04n438:439: ādiṣṭā paścime bhāge te vo rakṣantu sarvadā ||132 ||
S04n438:440: teṣāṃ cādhipatī rājā virūpākṣeti taṃ viduḥ |
S04n438:442: putrā pi tasya bahavaḥ ekanāmā vicakṣaṇāḥ |
S04n438:444: te'pi va adhipālentu ārogyena śivena ca ||134 ||
S04n438:447: ekādaśā navamikā śītā kṛṣṇā ca draupadī |
S04n438:448: tā pi va adhipālentu ārogyena śivena ca ||136 ||
S04n438:449: paścime'smin diśo bhāge aṣṭaṅgo nāma parvataḥ |
S04n438:451: so'pi va adhipāletu ārogyena śivena ca ||137 ||
S04n438:452: kṣemāśca vo diśaḥ santu mā ca vaḥ pāpamāgamat |
S04n438:455: nakṣatrāṇi vaḥ pālentu ye tāṃ diśamadhiṣṭhitā ||139 ||
S04n438:456: dhaniṣṭhā śatabhiṣā caiva dve ca purvottarāpare |
S04n438:457: ravatī aśvinī caiva bharaṇī bhavatī saptamī ||140 ||
S04n438:459: ādiṣṭā uttare bhāge te vo rakṣantu sarvadā ||141 ||
S04n438:462: putrā pi tasya bahava ekanāmā vicakṣaṇāḥ |
S04n438:464: te pi va adhipālentu ārogyena śivena ca ||143 ||
S04n438:467: upasthitā mahārājā āśā śraddhā hirī śirī |
S04n438:468: tā pi va adhipālentu ārogyena śivena ca ||145 ||
S04n438:471: te'pi va adhipālentu ārogyena śivena ca ||146 ||
S04n438:472: kṣemāśca vo diśaḥ santu mā ca vaḥ pāpamāgamat |
S04n438:479: aṣṭau devāḥ saindrakāste vo rakṣantu sarvataḥ ||149 ||
S04n438:480: svasti vo gacchatāṃ bhotu svasti bhotu nivartatām |
S04n438:481: svasti paśyata vai jñātiṃ svasti paśyantu jñātayaḥ ||150 ||
